mapper.select: SELECT id, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time FROM bot.trade_history
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO bot.trade_history ( tranId, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time ) VALUES ( #{tranId}, #{price}, #{symbol}, #{qty}, #{quoteQty}, #{isBestMatch}, #{isBuyerMaker}, #{time} )
